name: NFT Generator
description:
NFTs. What are they, but garbage art made by money hungry people. Turns out, they're easy as heck to make!

Made in a WHOPPING 2 HOURS, you can now generate your own fake NFTs using this simple tool, with over 36,450 different possible combinations ! Just press the button above the frame, and bada bing bada boom, you've got your own nft now. And you didn't even have to sell your kidney and an arm to buy it and lose all the money you invested because it has no real value! You can also save your brand new ecological disaster generator using the button on the bottom.

(p.s. while this game is not meant to be taken seriously (obviously), you should inform yourselves about why NFTs are terrible for consumers, the environment, but great for people who want to make a quick buck.)

Music by Bensmir:

https://bensmir.itch.io/lofi-beats-vol1
